item.description: A US citizen has been fatally shot by an immigration agent in Minnestota.

item.title: Catherine joins William for London hospital visit
item.description: The visit to Charing Cross Hospital is the couple's first public engagement of 2026.

item.title: Business rate rises for pubs to be watered down after pressure from landlords
item.description: The hospitality industry had called for a rethink of planned changes to the way the tax based on property is calculated.

item.title: Two starkly opposed Americas laid bare by deadly ICE shooting
item.description: The incident is threatening to inflame a deeply contentious debate over immigration enforcement.

item.title: Jeremy Bowen: Trump risks pushing world back to age of empires
item.description: Donald Trump wants and needs quick victories. Taking Maduro is the decisive win he has craved, writes Jeremy Bowen.
